languages.text: "Если бы человеческий род шел, подобно детям Азуриана, своими Путями... Этот мон-кай был бы тем, кто свой Путь потерял".
"If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
languages.original_text: "Если бы человеческий род шел, подобно детям Азуриана, своими Путями... Этот мон-кай был бы тем, кто свой Путь потерял".

traits.locale_text: "If Humankind were to follow its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
"If Humankind were to follow its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
"If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
"If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
"If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
"If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

languages.text: « Si l'Humanité suivait ses propres voies comme les enfants d'Asuryan... ce mon-keigh ferait partie de ceux qui se sont perdus en route. »
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'Humanité suivait ses propres voies comme les enfants d'Asuryan... ce mon-keigh ferait partie de ceux qui se sont perdus en route. »

languages.text: «Si la Humanidad siguiera sus propias sendas, como hacemos los Hijos de Asuryan... este mon-keigh habría descarriado de la suya».
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

traits.locale_text: «Si la Humanidad siguiera sus propias sendas, como hacemos los Hijos de Asuryan... este mon-keigh habría descarriado de la suya».

languages.text: 「もし人類がアシュリアンの御子のように自らの道を歩んでいるのなら…このモン＝ケイは道を見失った者と言うことだな」
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

traits.locale_text: 「もし人類がアシュリアンの御子のように自らの道を歩んでいるのなら…このモン＝ケイは道を見失った者と言うことだな」

languages.text: “如果人类也像阿苏焉之子一样，每个人都有着各自的道途……那他就是只迷失了道途的猴子。”
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

traits.locale_text: “如果人类也像阿苏焉之子一样，每个人都有着各自的道途……那他就是只迷失了道途的猴子。”

languages.text: "Würde die Menschheit ihre eigenen Pfade verfolgen, wie es die Kinder von Asuryan tun ... wäre dieser Chem-Pan-Sey derjenige, der seinen Pfad verloren hat."
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."

traits.locale_text: "Würde die Menschheit ihre eigenen Pfade verfolgen, wie es die Kinder von Asuryan tun ... wäre dieser Chem-Pan-Sey derjenige, der seinen Pfad verloren hat."

languages.text: "İnsanlık, Asuryan'ın Çocukları gibi kendi yolundan gitseydi... Bu mon-keigh, yolunu kaybetmişlerden olurdu."
languages.original_text: "If Humankind followed its own Paths as the Children of Asuryan do... this mon-keigh would be one who has lost his Path."
